name: df-cau
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(ccau, cmpt(s0, cuni(crn(cxmet)), crab(s1, co(cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cpm, cc), wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, cz, wf(cres(cv(s1), cfv(cuz, cv(s3))), cfv(cuz, cv(s3)), co(cfv(cv(s1), cv(s3)), cfv(cbl, cv(s0)), cv(s2))))))))
comment: Define the set of Cauchy sequences on a given extended metric space. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2006.)
